programme.title: Tanked
programme.desc: A previous customer is back, asking for an even bigger and better tank. And, the guys build a custom acrylic waterfall for a memorial in Las Vegas.

programme.title: The Vet Life

programme.title: Jungle Shark

programme.desc: Dr. Dee flies her mom to a remote vet clinic in Manley Hot Springs, Alaska. At Animal House, a bunny has a tricky abscess, and some St. Bernard puppies visit the clinic!

programme.title: Jeremy Wades Dark Waters
programme.desc: Tales of monstrous pike have persisted in Europe for generations. Jeremy Wade is on a journey to catch this prehistoric monster, starting in the lakes of Ireland and leading to waters on the edge of the Arctic Circle in Sweden.

programme.title: Alaska: Surviving the Last Frontier

programme.title: In Search Of Monsters
programme.desc: New evidence reveals a Vietnam War pilot may have returned home with a secret cargo. Experts use this to try and find the missing link in human evolution.

programme.title: Wild Mexico
programme.desc: Mexico. It is an ancient, majestic land, full of diversity and mystery. It is home to a vast wilderness of oceans, deserts, jungle, and unique creatures that are found nowhere else on earth.

programme.title: Im Alive
programme.desc: When a hunter is brutally attacked by three grizzly bears, his best friend must find a way to get him to help before its too late.

programme.title: The Vet Life
programme.desc: Dr Ross takes care of a pair of roosters involved in a barnyard brawl and joins Dr Lavigne for a hyena consultation. And, Dr Blue treats a paralysed Yorkie.

programme.desc: Dr Blue needs to act fast when a Rottweiler in labor is rushed to the hospital. And, the three vets put on their cowboy boots for Houstons biggest rodeo parade.

programme.title: Alaska: Surviving the Last Frontier
programme.desc: Four groups of intrepid adventurers abandon the convenience and technological trappings of modern living and attempt to survive the wilds of Alaska.

programme.title: Pianoforte : le concours Frederic-Chopin à Varsovie
programme.desc: Une immersion de plusieurs semaines dans le quotidien de six jeunes pianistes qui passent le très renomme concours Chopin de Varsovie.

programme.title: Larchipel dHawaï
programme.desc: La troisième plus grande île de l’archipel, Oahu, abrite Honolulu, la capitale de ce qui est aussi le 50e État americain. Situee sur la côte sud, elle est particulièrement reputee pour son quartier de Waikiki, separe du reste de la ville par un canal, qui compte un port et une plage paradisiaque.

programme.title: Les maîtres des abeilles
programme.desc: En Argentine, la transhumance au fil de l’eau de centaines d’apiculteurs dans un veritable eden pour les abeilles...

programme.title: Les energies de la mer, toujours en lice ?
programme.desc: Parviendrons-nous un jour à produire de l’electricite à grande echelle en utilisant la puissance des oceans ? Un etat des lieux des echecs et des percees novatrices en la matière.

programme.title: ARTE Regards
programme.desc: Chaque annee, les rescapes de la tragedie qui avait bouleverse l’Europe en 2013 se retrouvent à Lampedusa. Près de 370 personnes avaient peri lors du naufrage de leur embarcation au large de l’île italienne. Ce jour-là, 47 migrants ont ete sauves par le pecheur Vito Fiorino. Depuis, ils reviennent chaque annee et retrouvent celui qui est devenu leur "père".

programme.title: ARTE Journal Junior
programme.desc: Le JT matinal et quotidien de six minutes pour les 10-14 ans.

programme.title: GEO Reportage
programme.desc: Le volcan Iodake occupe plus de la moitie de la surface de l’île de Satsuma Iwojima, au sud-ouest du Japon. Ses habitants ont vecu de l’extraction du soufre pendant presque un millenaire avant que l’activite ne decline. Si nombre d’entre eux ont quitte leur île natale, d’autres s’emploient à y attirer des touristes et de nouveaux residents.

programme.title: Voyage en cuisine
programme.desc: "Voyage en cuisine" nous emmène dans les cuisines du monde entier, à la decouverte de recettes traditionnelles et de leurs origines. La tarte au citron de Floride : la Key lime pie - Le goût du pays : Heather, une Floridienne au Portugal.

programme.title: Invitation au voyage
programme.desc: Linda Lorin nous emmène à la decouverte de notre patrimoine artistique, culturel et naturel. Orchestra Baobab, bande originale du Senegal - En Turquie, des hommes mènent la danse - Aux Philippines, la soupe au pied de bœuf de Casiano - À Brest, la guerre fait surface.

programme.title: Invitation au voyage
programme.desc: Linda Lorin nous emmène à la decouverte de notre patrimoine artistique, culturel et naturel. La Nouvelle-Zelande metissee de Keri Hulme - Au Mexique, l’art de la ceramique noire - À Madère, la polenta et les chinchards de Maria - Au Japon, une imposture prehistorique.

programme.title: LAfrique vue du ciel
programme.desc: Des immenses etendues naturelles sauvages aux megalopoles, une decouverte spectaculaire du continent africain depuis le ciel.

programme.title: Caracal, la societe du chat solitaire
programme.desc: Dans les savanes d’Afrique du Sud, une jeune femelle caracal s’essaie aux rudiments de la chasse. Après avoir essuye de multiples revers, risquant à tout moment d’etre devoree par un lion, elle effectue une longue peregrination vers le sud et decouvre la banlieue de la ville du Cap… et ses multiples opportunites.

programme.title: Kenya, gardiennes des elephants
programme.desc: Dans la reserve kenyane du Namunyak, refuge des pachydermes, la secheresse menace les humains comme les animaux. Ce documentaire suit deux gardiennes d’elephanteaux qui luttent sans relâche pour proteger l’avenir de tous.

programme.title: ARTE Regards
programme.desc: En Roumanie, la stigmatisation des troubles psychiques reste profonde, et ceux qui en souffrent trop souvent relegues en marge de la societe. Ciprian Hord, psychologue et photographe, travaille dans un hôpital. Arme de son appareil photo, de son empathie et de sa creativite, il capture des fragments d’humanite, des eclats de dignite retrouvee et offre aux malades un nouvel espace d’expression.

programme.title: Meurtre mysterieux à Manhattan
programme.desc: Carol Lipton sinteresse à la mort subite de sa voisine, au grand damne de son voisin, qui aurait prefere que lon enterre laffaire.

programme.title: Les delices d’Émilie-Romagne
programme.desc: Un delicieux voyage à la croisee des traditions culinaires du nord de lItalie. Cet episode nous emmène à Parme et dans louest de lÉmilie-Romagne, où se deploie une grande diversite de paysages, dont la celèbre plaine du Pô. Au menu : des tagliatelles issues de varietes anciennes de cereales, du parmesan au lait de vache rousse et le gâteau rouge de Langhirano.

programme.title: Le ventre de Porto
programme.desc: À Porto, le Mercado do Bolhao a rouvert ses portes en 2022, après une minutieuse restauration. Symbole des traditions culinaires et culturelles de la region du Douro, on y trouve des sardines, des tripes ou des broa de Avintes, petits pains de seigle et de maïs.

programme.title: Le ventre de Rome
programme.desc: Plus grand marche de la Ville Éternelle, le Mercato Trionfale represente l’essence de la cuisine romaine, des artichauts au baccalà (morue salee), en passant par le pecorino romano (fromage de brebis sale) ou la porchetta, à base de cochon de lait.

programme.title: Invitation au voyage
programme.desc: Linda Lorin nous emmène à la decouverte de notre patrimoine artistique, culturel et naturel. La psychose new-yorkaise de Bret Easton Ellis - Au Benin, la Route de l’esclave - À Tourcoing, la fricadelle au maroilles de Corentin et Laurence - En Slovenie, resister par la voix.

programme.title: Invitation au voyage
programme.desc: Linda Lorin nous emmène à la decouverte de notre patrimoine artistique, culturel et naturel. Au Costa Rica, Walter Ferguson sacre roi du calypso - En Irak, Gertrude Bell dessine un pays - En Allemagne, le ragoût de poumon de veau de Susanne - À Cerbère, les oranges ont le goût de la revolte.

programme.title: Voyage en cuisine
programme.desc: "Voyage en cuisine" nous emmène dans les cuisines du monde entier, à la decouverte de recettes traditionnelles et de leurs origines. Le roi des poissons australiens : le barramundi - Le goût du pays : Daniel, un Australien à Athènes.

programme.title: Le dessous des images
programme.desc: En quelques annees, le QR code a envahi notre quotidien. Ces pixels noirs et blancs s’affichent dorenavant partout : commerces, restaurants ou encore cimetières. Mais que disent-ils de notre civilisation numerisee ? Retour sur ces petites images codees.

programme.title: ARTE Journal
programme.desc: Chaque jour à 19h45, la redaction franco-allemande dARTE Journal propose une approche europeenne et culturelle de lactualite. Un regard original sur le monde.

programme.title: 28 minutes
programme.desc: Presente par Élisabeth Quin du lundi au jeudi et Renaud Dely les vendredi et samedi, le rendez-vous quotidien consacre à l’actualite et au debat.

programme.title: Le dessous des cartes - Lessentiel
programme.desc: Un coup de projecteur sur un element important de l’actualite internationale en train de se produire.

programme.title: The Deal
programme.desc: Avril 2015. Un « round de la dernière chance » reunit à Genève les États-Unis, l’Iran, l’Europe, la Russie et la Chine afin d’encadrer le programme nucleaire de l’Iran, soupçonne de vouloir se doter de l’arme atomique. Cheffe du protocole suisse, Alexandra Weiss orchestre dans l’ombre ces negociations sous haute tension, sans se douter que des espions ont pour mission de les faire echouer. Alors qu’Alexandra est propulsee à la tete de la mission diplomatique suisse, un ingenieur iranien rejoint la table des negociations.

programme.title: The Deal
programme.desc: Alexandra est bouleversee par l’arrivee inattendue du nouvel ingenieur, Payam Sanjabi, affaibli par un sejour dans les prisons de Teheran. Alexandra tente de lui parler, mais celui-ci est sous constante surveillance. Mohsem Mahdavi, le Ministre des Affaires etrangères iranien, doit regler des difficultes familiales et fait appel à Babak Pirouz, un homme d’affaires douteux. Prive de son passeport, Sanjabi supplie Alexandra de lui venir en aide.

programme.title: The Deal
programme.desc: L’Iran tire un missile vers le Golan et les negociations sont sur le point de s’arreter. Cindy Cohen, Sous-secretaire d’État americaine, met la pression sur Mahdavi pour tenter de les sauver. Andrew Porter, representant du Tresor americain, fait une rencontre nocturne qui ne tarde pas à le mettre dans l’embarras. Alors que les services de renseignements israeliens cherchent par tous les moyens à savoir ce qui se trame à la table des negociations, Alexandra trouve un stratagème pour voir Sanjabi dans l’intimite.

programme.title: Freddie Mercury, The Great Pretender
programme.desc: À base darchives et de temoignages rares, un portrait passionnant de Freddie Mercury (1946-1991), le legendaire leader de Queen, enigmatique icône musicale aux multiples facettes.

programme.title: Les super-predateurs des mers
programme.desc: Dans les eaux qui bordent l’Alaska, les baleines chassent ensemble. Dans le detroit de Chatham, une equipe de biologistes et de bioacousticiens etudie les techniques de chasse collective des baleines à bosse afin de mieux comprendre comment ces cetaces communiquent entre eux et se coordonnent.

programme.title: Les super-predateurs des mers
programme.desc: Une plongee dans les secrets de l’intelligence animale, à la decouverte des incroyables strategies de chasse deployees par les predateurs marins. Tourne en Argentine, dans la baie de Puerto Madryn, cet episode decrypte la technique d’echouage des orques, et revèle avec des images aeriennes comment, au sein du clan, elle se transmet aux jeunes, futurs chasseurs.

programme.title: Les super-predateurs des mers
programme.desc: Les effets du changement climatique mettent en presence des espèces qui ne se sont jamais rencontrees auparavant.

programme.title: Des animaux et des arbres
programme.desc: Traversee dimages spectaculaires, cette immersion dans la foret gaspesienne, au Canada, revèle les liens etonnants quentretiennent les arbres et les animaux.

programme.title: Les animaux de l’aeroport
programme.desc: Lapins, renards, campagnols, herissons, chevreuils, etourneaux, rapaces... : les aeroports abritent une biodiversite insoupçonnee. À travers les yeux d’un renard aventureux, une malicieuse exploration de la faune qui peuple les abords des aeroports.

programme.title: Depression chez les hommes, un mal silencieux
programme.desc: À la rencontre de patients et de specialistes, cet etat des lieux sensible revèle combien il reste difficile pour une majorite dhommes souffrant de depression den reconnaître les symptômes.

programme.title: ARTE Regards
programme.desc: En Roumanie, la stigmatisation des troubles psychiques reste profonde, et ceux qui en souffrent trop souvent relegues en marge de la societe. Ciprian Hord, psychologue et photographe, travaille dans un hôpital. Arme de son appareil photo, de son empathie et de sa creativite, il capture des fragments d’humanite, des eclats de dignite retrouvee et offre aux malades un nouvel espace d’expression.

programme.title: ARTE Journal Junior
programme.desc: Le JT matinal et quotidien de six minutes pour les 10-14 ans.

programme.title: GEO Reportage
programme.desc: En Estonie, larrivee de lete marque le debut de la saison des mariages. Pour sassurer un moment inoubliable, les amoureux ne laissent rien au hasard et ne lesinent pas sur les jeux de plein air. Chaque ete, des dizaines de candidates viennent de toute lEstonie et des pays voisins pour participer à une course de jeunes mariees sous les encouragements de leur moitie, dans lespoir de decrocher une belle recompense.

programme.title: Voyage en cuisine
programme.desc: "Voyage en cuisine" nous emmène dans les cuisines du monde entier, à la decouverte de recettes traditionnelles et de leurs origines. Le roi des poissons australiens : le barramundi - Le goût du pays : Daniel, un Australien à Athènes.

programme.title: Invitation au voyage
programme.desc: Linda Lorin nous emmène à la decouverte de notre patrimoine artistique, culturel et naturel. Au Costa Rica, Walter Ferguson sacre roi du calypso - En Irak, Gertrude Bell dessine un pays - En Allemagne, le ragoût de poumon de veau de Susanne - À Cerbère, les oranges ont le goût de la revolte.

programme.title: Invitation au voyage
programme.desc: Linda Lorin nous emmène à la decouverte de notre patrimoine artistique, culturel et naturel. La psychose new-yorkaise de Bret Easton Ellis - Au Benin, la Route de l’esclave - À Tourcoing, la fricadelle au maroilles de Corentin et Laurence - En Slovenie, resister par la voix.

programme.title: Une histoire mondiale de la navigation
programme.desc: Depuis quand les humains sillonnent-ils les mers ? Une retrospective de l’histoire de la navigation, de l’Antiquite jusqu’à la mise à leau des premiers paquebots, illustree par dimpressionnantes archives.

programme.title: 360° Reportage
programme.desc: GEO Reportage parcourt le monde à la recherche d’histoires extraordinaires et de rencontres insolites.

programme.title: Le ventre de Cracovie
programme.desc: À Cracovie, le marche Stary Kleparz offre une grande variete de produits indispensables aux recettes typiques de la cuisine polonaise, tels que le bigos, un ragoût de chou fermente, les ravioles ou pierogi, l’oscypek, un fromage fume, ou encore les paczki, des beignets fourres à la confiture.

programme.title: Les maîtres des abeilles
programme.desc: L’abeille carniolienne est originaire de Slovenie. Les habitants de ce petit pays des Balkans nourrissent un profond respect pour cette espèce autochtone. Brane Kozinc, issu d’une longue lignee d’apiculteurs, est l’un des quinze eleveurs officiels du pays. Il a installe ses ruches sur les pentes du Triglav, le plus haut sommet slovène, situe dans les Alpes juliennes.

programme.title: ARTE Regards
programme.desc: Servals, sangliers, singes : de plus en plus de particuliers s’entourent d’animaux de compagnie inhabituels. Un phenomène qui conduit trop souvent à des conditions de vie inadaptees. Dans ce reportage, des passionnees s’engagent pour offrir un foyer à ces animaux sauvages. Un combat freine par le manque de moyens et les obstacles juridiques.

programme.title: Lappât
programme.desc: Après avoir capture un hors-la-loi, trois hommes s’associent dans un voyage seme d’embûches pour empocher la prime.

programme.title: Le Massif central
programme.desc: Avec ses plateaux de calcaire blanc tranchant sur des forets verdoyantes, le Massif central est une terre de contrastes dont les habitants luttent pour preserver la beaute. Des cratères des volcans auvergnats aux eaux cristallines de l’Allier, ultime fleuve sauvage de France, premier volet d’une exploration pleine de surprises.

programme.title: Le Massif central
programme.desc: Le Massif central est une terre de contrastes dont les habitants luttent pour preserver la beaute. Second chapitre du voyage avec un portrait des Cevennes et de l’Ardèche, à travers plusieurs initiatives locales pensees pour proteger les specificites du territoire et garantir un artisanat durable.

programme.title: Le ventre de Bucarest
programme.desc: Deambulations gourmandes dans de celèbres marches du Vieux Continent, où se melent couleurs, parfums, produits de saison et echanges animes.

programme.title: Invitation au voyage
programme.desc: Quatre sujets pour decouvrir la Jamaïque : l’ecrivain americain Russel Banks et son polar, "Le livre de la Jamaïque" ; le rastafarisme ; la recette du pudding de patates douces ; Saint Ann’s Bay, le lieu où echoua la flotte de Christophe Colomb en 1503.

programme.title: Invitation au voyage
programme.desc: Linda Lorin nous emmène à la decouverte de notre patrimoine artistique, culturel et naturel. Gabrielle Filteau-Chiba, l’encabanee du Quebec - El Yunque, la foret enchantee de Porto Rico - En Nouvelle-Zelande, le poisson au curry de Shaan - Les momies font frissonner le Mexique.

programme.title: Voyage gourmand
programme.desc: C’est dans les montagnes du nord-est de la Sardaigne que Renzo et Franca Corda elèvent leurs abeilles, productrices de miel de thym et de romarin sauvage. Sur l’île de La Gomera, Guarapero Tanausú Chavez recolte le precieux miel de palme, sève du palmier dattier, symbole des Canaries. En glace cremeuse ou en pain d’epice pour agrementer son filet de chevreuil, la cheffe Lucie Fischer-Chapalain explore les declinaisons de l’or liquide.

programme.title: Le dessous des cartes
programme.desc: "Le dessous des cartes" se penche sur un drame qui se joue en silence sous nos yeux : l’extinction d’innombrables espèces d’animaux. Des pans entiers de la faune disparaissent à un rythme sans precedent sur tous les continents. Quels sont les grands foyers de disparition ? Que revèle la carte mondiale des espèces menacees ? Et que pouvons-nous encore sauver ?

programme.title: ARTE Journal
programme.desc: Chaque jour à 19h45, la redaction franco-allemande dARTE Journal propose une approche europeenne et culturelle de lactualite. Un regard original sur le monde.

programme.title: 28 minutes
programme.desc: Presente par Élisabeth Quin du lundi au jeudi et Renaud Dely les vendredi et samedi, le rendez-vous quotidien consacre à l’actualite et au debat.

programme.title: Tu mourras moins bete
programme.desc: Le professeur Moustache demystifie la science par la pratique. Une serie danimation "scientifico-trash" à lhumour ravageur, avec la voix de François Morel. Aujourdhui : peut-on confondre de la pâtee pour chien avec des rillettes ? Si vous etes un chien, non, si vous etes un homme, oui.

programme.title: Meurtres à Sandhamn
programme.desc: Des decès suspects commencent à etre signales à la police, causes par ce qui semble etre un nouveau narcotique chimique. La police interrompt une vente de stupefiants et un jeune trafiquant est arrete. Nora est appele sur laffaire et rencontre pour la première fois Alexander, un nouvel enqueteur...

programme.title: Bruce Springsteen, le chanteur qui murmurait à loreille de lAmerique
programme.desc: Retour sur la carrière du "Boss", icône sensible et revoltee dont la guitare a accompagne les combats brûlants de son siècle – et qui a presente au monde le meilleur visage de lAmerique.

programme.title: Bruce Springsteen and the E Street Band - Darkness on the Edge of Town
programme.desc: En 2009, Bruce Springsteen et son E Street Band sinstallaient dans un theâtre historique du New Jersey pour celebrer les trente ans de lalbum "Darkness on The Edge of Town". Dans une performance rare et inedite à la television, lartiste et ses musiciens reprenaient la plupart des titres de cet opus legendaire.

programme.title: Le choix nous appartient
programme.desc: L’enlèvement du penseur allemand Jan Philipp Reemtsma en 1996 marque un tournant majeur dans la vie de son fils, le futur musicien Johann Scheerer. Inspiree du roman autobiographique dans lequel celui-ci raconte la prise d’otage de son père, cette fiction haletante brosse un portrait sensible de l’adolescence.

programme.title: Bake Off: The Professionals
programme.desc: Just four teams remain for the semi-finals, with challenges including the creation of an impressive tower of tarts and a spectacular piece of gourmet theatre known as live plating. At the end of the challenge, the teams are given three minutes to transform their table - and their cake - into a gastronomic work of art, with three of them securing their places in the grand final.

programme.title: Rick Steins Long Weekends
programme.desc: The chef heads to Cadiz in Spain, where he samples two of the citys most revered culinary stars - fresh tuna and Manzanilla sherry. Rick is captivated by the narrow winding streets as he walks in the footsteps of the ancient Phoenician and Arab traders, whose influence on the city can still be seen to this day. Back home, he prepares flamenco eggs and arroz verde, or green rice, made with garlic, parsley, clams and prawns, producing the vibrant colours of the Spanish flag.

programme.desc: Mrs Wicket has just inherited an antique grandfather clock – Mr Bean is impressed! But he soon starts to resent it when it bongs loudly on the hour all through the night. Desperate for sleep as dawn is breaking, he fiddles inside the clock, only for it to fall apart and onto the floor! Can he get the bulky heirloom to a repair shop and back before Mrs Wicket wakes up?

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: A day on the beach turns into a desperate struggle to catch the sun for Mr Bean.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean arranges a last-minute birthday treat for Teddy, including a morning in a toy shop and burgers for lunch. With the voice of Rowan Atkinson.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Beans electricity is cut off when Mrs Wicket sees her electricity bill, but he has a back-up idea - a wind turbine. With the voice of Rowan Atkinson

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The premiere event on the fashion calendar is about to begin!! The Docs chase Lamput in through the stage door and bring the tone way down. Before you know it everyone’s embarked upon a short and exceedingly painful catwalk career. This season’s colour: orange. The Docs try their hand at lighting design. They suck at that, too. The blue nerds get ejected hard by venue security, and Lamput becomes the hit look of the show. So versatile! So changeable! One size fits all!

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings, who are both starving, discover a temple dedicated to an ancestral brioche. According to the book lying open inside the temple, to obtain a perfect brioche you must gather three gold ingredients and set them on the altar. When the panda idol who guards the temple receives the offering, the person will receive his favorite food in abundance. Grizzy and Lemmings set out to find the sacred ingredients but there is no question of working together. May the best critter win!

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: An AI accidentally connects to Grizzy’s stuffed teddy bear, which comes to life.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy asks the Lemmings to play with a baby ostrich found outside in exchange for their ventilator.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy has played for too many hours on the console. His eyes are so fatigued he cannot stand a single ray of light. The Lemmings choose this very moment to throw a big birthday party with as many lights as possible! Grizzy goes to great lengths to settle the issue and decides to trip the power supply. The Lemmings discover a source of magical light deep in the savanna.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings decide to play hide-and-seek in the Savannah.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have organized a mega party at the cabin. This is obviously not to Grizzy’s liking and the bear throws them out. The Lemmings discover a cave where the party is even more fun, but their ruckus drives out the bats who seek refuge in the cabin. Terrified of them, Grizzy tries everything to get rid of them and understands that the most effective thing is the Lemmings’ ghetto blaster.

programme.title: SuperThings: Rivals of Kaboom - Kazoom Power
programme.desc: Mia and Kai have to infiltrate Enigma’s base, taken over by the villains, to get it back and access the super computer.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: When an artificial intelligence takes over a trendy tech company, the gang must solve the computerized crime.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: The Gang has seats on the largest airplane ever to fly the open airways! Unfortunately the plane is also beset by a Gremlin bent on sabotaging the flight! The Gang has to step up to solve the airborne mystery as well as deal with something even scarier: Daphne flying a plane!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: “Chasing Lamput” turns out to be the ultimate backstage pass; the Docs pursue the orange blob through the dressing room and directly onto the stage of a gigantic stadium rock concert. The crowd goes wild. Which raises questions about their taste in music, to be honest; Skinny plays guitar like he’s gotten himself tangled in the strings (which he has), and Specs’ drumming, well, it’s certainly got passion. No taste, skill or rhythm, but certainly passion. The stage ends up in tatters by the time the actual band arrives. Those Docs are a hard act to follow.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs Wicket has just inherited an antique grandfather clock – Mr Bean is impressed! But he soon starts to resent it when it bongs loudly on the hour all through the night. Desperate for sleep as dawn is breaking, he fiddles inside the clock, only for it to fall apart and onto the floor! Can he get the bulky heirloom to a repair shop and back before Mrs Wicket wakes up?

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean buys a robot to clean his flat but it ends up trashing half the town.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean wants an ice cream from the ice cream van but ends up serving himself – along with every kid in town.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Eating too many sweets gives Bean a terrible toothache, and when all other attempts at curing it are exhausted, he reluctantly visits the dreaded dentist.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: Not easy to enjoy a DVD about salmon when the Lemmings are having a disco party right there. Grizzy sends them packing with such force that they land at the research station, where they discover a state-of-the-art U.V. cabin. When turned up to the max, the light therapy and music options can advantageously replace the disco equipment Grizzy destroyed. The noise they make causes a block of ice to break off. It hurdles down the slope to the cabin and destroys Grizzy’s TV. But it doesn’t take the bear long to figure out that the U.V. cabin also has a DVD function.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have fun destroying ice towers. When Grizzy sees them, it inspires him to sculpt statues of himself. The Lemmings cannot resist the temptation to destroy the statues of Grizzy, who does everything in his power to protect them.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: A container adrift along the icefield will change the lives of Grizzy and the Lemmings: it’s an inexhaustible stock of chocolate spread! There is so much, that for the first time the close enemies have no need to fight over the treat. They entice a flock of penguins into hoisting the container out of the water. One of the penguins, who did not get his reward in fish, is disgruntled. Grizzy has him taste the Yummy, then throws the jar far away to get rid of the penguin. The chocolate treat spreads over the icefield. Fatal error?

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy uses a fire extinguisher to chase the Lemmings from the living room so that he can take a nap, but the gadget accidentally flies out the window. It lands at the top of an ice cliff, causing a fissure, and the peak of the cliff topples. Amid the debris, the Lemmings discover a fearsome creature: the Yeti, who is looking for the guilty party. The Lemmings bring him to Grizzy, never dreaming that the giant will immediately fall in love with the Ranger’s cabin and throw a very original party.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy decides to adopt a coconut. The Lemmings decide to hide inside other coconuts to be adopted too!

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy pretends to have a twisted ankle so that the Lemmings have to take care of him.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have set up a mini-fair but Grizzy steals the Lemmings tickets in order to hit the jackpot

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When all of the Batwheels (except for Bam) mysteriously disappear, Bam enlists the help of A.D.A.M, the original Batmobile, to help save his friends. Along the way, Bam comes to appreciate the old-school mobiles different crimefighting style as they team up to take on the Legion of Zoom.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Much to everyone’s surprise, Bam is secretly afraid of the dark. When Poison Ivy knocks out all the power in Gotham, Bam must conquer his fears to stop her.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Redbird tries his hand at espionage as “V-8, the Super-Spy”, he quickly realizes hes gotten in over his head.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Bibi has a terrible no-good day after she keeps messing up and lets Joker get away. She doesn’t think he can help Batgirl anymore, but a “bad today” doesn’t mean it’ll be a “bad tomorrow".

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Pro snowboarder Pepper Polar Bear hires The Looney Builders to build a ski resort. Pepper soon learns that others have different skill levels.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Wile E. Coyote hires The Looney Builders to build him a house in the desert so he can be alone. The Road Runner tries to pay him a visit causing Wile E. to heighten his security measures.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders are hired by the town’s volunteer firefighters to build a fire truck. Duty calls and they build on the go as they make rescues throughout Looneyburg.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Witch Hazel hires The Looney Builders to make her house look spooky for Halloween.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Waffles is worried that his roommate Bo had his brain eaten by aliens, leaving him a zombie dog. Turns out hes not the first dog in his neighborhood to wake up stupid. Afraid of becoming the next Bo, Waffles hires the Cat and Mouse Detectives to put a stop to this alien invasion. Our Narrator thinks all of this extraterrestrial talk is a load of sci-fi hooey but not our detectives; theyre covering all their bases and taking every necessary precaution. Turns out the dogs behavior has more to do with a tainted bag of kibble than visitors from another planet… or does it?

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Butch finds a wish bone in the garbage and dupes Tom into believing that it will make his wishes come true. Butch trades Tom the bone for a dozen cans of cat food. The alley cat thinks hes pulled off the best scam ever UNTIL Toms wishes start coming true (from Jerry getting his just dessert to Toodles paying an unexpected visit)! Now Butch will stop at nothing to get that bone back!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: When Rick uploads a video of Tom getting his head stuck in Jerrys mouse hole, the video instantly goes viral and Tom becomes the laughing stock of the feline community. Now Tom must restore his reputation by catching Jerry and capturing it all on video. Easier said than done.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: When a Hare loses to a Tortoise in the biggest race of the year, he comes to Tom and Jerry claiming foul play. Its up to the duo to see whats really behind the most famous race in history.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Hildie and Beatie return from the Ol Time Goblin Fair with kettle corn, a giant stuffed warlock, and a piranha they won in the ball toss. Despite their warning not to touch the fish, Tom cant pass up a chance to eat the catch of the day! But first he has to get past Jerry who is determined to protect his new friend. When a failed attempt by Tom ends up with the fish bowl being shattered, Jerry quickly casts a spell with the wand that allows the fish to breathe on dry land! The liberated fish is excited to explore his newfound freedom (walking on his tail fin) and ends up making life a lot more complicated for Jerry whos trying to protect him!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom and Butch both set out to win Toodles affection while Jerry plays Cyrano to Winston to help him get over his nerves.

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: When Glitchs compartment empties out and a huge amount of junk floats out, Ella suggests that Slippy get rid of it. They all head to Vesta. Madhu finds something that looks like a robot so the gang sets out to find the other pieces.

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Ella, Tilly, Slippy and Madhu are playing a game on the moon when it starts to rumble. The ground cracks open, and they fall into what they discover is a large network of tunnels underground.

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: When Angelie breaks Slippys Jupiter gliding record, hes equally upset and fascinated by her surfboard. The two agree on a rematch and set out to work on their vehicles. They both ask Ella for help.

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Ella finds her Nannys old Hide and Peek device and hopes to beat Slippys record for Hide and Seek! Gem and I.Lo are playing too. Slippy decides to make things more interesting by siphoning fuel from the Hide and Peek.

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: When Glitch’s compartment empties out and a huge amount of junk floats out, Ella suggests that Slippy get rid of it. They all head to Vesta. Slippy is enchanted by the amount of stuff on the planetoid. Madhu finds something that looks like a robot so the gang sets out to find the other pieces. They quickly put together an impressive robot they call Victor. Victor is designed to recycle and he happily does just that. But when Slippy brings him back to the Clubhouse, they soon realise Victor needs to be in his home.

programme.title: Toad And Friends

programme.desc: When Buffs trusty winch is knocked out of action by Poison Ivy, he must learn to improvise and come up with creative solutions on the fly.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Fred gets a call for help from Chuck, his daredevil of a best friend, leading the gang on a rescue mission deep in the caverns of an ancient civilization.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Its Scoobys dream come true as the gang visits the set of his favorite TV show and he meets the star, his celebrity crush, a dog actress who plays a detective on the screen. programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: As Mr Bean settles down to watch his favourite TV programme he hears loud noises from next-door. He moves from house to garden but can’t escape the relentless cacophony of trumpets, electric drills, and screaming babies. Bean’s mind turns to thoughts of revenge….

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: The lovable halfwit unknowingly takes a monkey home in his car after visiting a safari park

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean fancies a game of golf so he creates his own golf course inside his flat and invites Irma to join him for a round. Their somewhat eccentric game takes them from sitting room to bathroom and through Mrs Wicket’s flat as they battle to be the winner of the First Bean Open Championship.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean turns superhero in an attempt to outwit a cunning cat burglar.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs are late for work and Boss is furious! They cook up an epic story of how they were chasing Lamput all over the city, will Boss believe them?

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: While pursuing Lamput out at sea, Skinny becomes entranced by the sirens songs and gets captured. Specs team up with Lamput to attempt a rescue.

programme.title: Krypto Saves the Day!
programme.desc: When a black cat crosses Krypto’s path, he’s determined to catch it before Halloween night is through.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: While Grizzy organizes a picnic alongside the pond, the Lemmings steal his jar of Yummy using water balls to discreetly advance underwater. Despite their equipment, the bear surprises the Lemmings and traps the rodents inside a waterproof ball which he throws far into the distance. An ostrich mistakes the ball for her egg and sits on it, waiting for the egg to hatch. The Lemmings are adopted by this new mother who is prepared to do anything to satisfy her offspring!

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: Chased by a raging elephant, Grizzy and the Lemmings are ejected from the cabin and land on a small nearby promontory. One of the rodents finds himself seated upon a throne-shaped boulder. A ray of sunlight illuminates him, and the savannah animals bow down before the Lemming king! But as soon as he leaves his royal seat, his powers disappear. Grizzy grabs the opportunity to plop down on the throne. Upon his orders, the other animals seek to provide him with every comfort, bringing the cabin, television and food closer. But the Lemmings put their feet down.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings create an irresistible rhythm on a set of magic drums and kick off a battle of the bands with Grizzy, who just wants a good nights sleep.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings use magic Chinese lanterns for sound and light shows.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings

The rodents want to transform themselves into ice cubes to glide across their super curling ice slide, while Grizzy wishes merely to lie down inside the nice, cool appliance. After literally breaking the fridge in two, the Lemmings discover a container of refrigerant and create a new giant curling sheet in the savannah. But Grizzy has not given up the idea of resting in a cool spot!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: A scarecrow terrorizes Catsylvania.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Jerry is mistaken for a rare breed of Guinea Pig by the Duchess professor friend and uses his protected elevated status to create endless problems for Tom.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry have to contend with a baby polar bear that has been mistakenly delivered to Rick and Gingers house.

But instead of reading he becomes distracted by some funny online videos he sees on the Library’s computer. But does Mr Bean enjoy being in the public eye and how long will his celebrity last?

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is obsessed with his favourite TV show Super Spy but takes his snooping a little too far.

programme.desc: Mr Bean inadvertently causes an accident which prevents Irma taking the scout troop to Big Bear’s Scout Camp. As temporary scoutmaster Mr Bean enjoys his new role but his obsessive badge collecting wins him no friends within the group.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: An escaped prisoner suffers hard labour under Mrs Wicket while Mr Bean puts his feet up in jail.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: The hapless hero visits the Science Museum, where he makes a new friend with a bagful of gadgets.

programme.desc: Mr Bean inadvertently becomes a teacher. Can he control the unruly class?

programme.desc: Mr Bean finds out he is a Lord and visits his Scottish family home. But keeping a castle is a costly business.

programme.desc: Lamput decides to help distressed duck parents find their missing children. But the ducklings are too much for him to handle!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Mayor Leghorn hires The Looney Builders to build a water wheel in the forest where Porky worries about a mythical creature named “Big Feet.”

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders build Tibs Squirrel a closet in his tree, but it won’t fit all of Tibs’ stuff and he doesn’t want to get rid of anything.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: MOE wants to know what its like to be a member of the Batwheels, but the bot gets more than he bargained for when Bam invites him along for an exciting mission to stop Poison Ivy.

programme.title: Krypto Saves the Day!
programme.desc: When a black cat crosses Krypto’s path, he’s determined to catch it before Halloween night is through.

programme.title: Krypto Saves the Day!
programme.desc: Krypto embarks on a high-flying chase that creates major mayhem for a bus driver on his way to school.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: On a trip to Japan to visit Velmas friend, the gang comes face to face with the ancient crab monster, Kaniaku, and attempts to solve a 700 year-old mystery. Meanwhile, Daphne accidentally becomes a viral media sensation in Japan!

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: When the ghost of a small towns founder returns to scare off mayoral candidates, the gang decides to run Velma as mayor to bait the ghost. They quickly discover, however, that Velma lacks the skillset to make her a popular politician!

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean buys an expensive dress for Irma which he plans to return - so has to protect it from damage.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Beans landlady orders him to get rid of a mole making a mess of her exquisitely manicured croquet lawn.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean is angry about roadworks.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean attempts to retrieve his cash card and "accidently" ends up inside a bank vault.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Specs and Skinny spruce themselves up and head out to a piano concerto in the royal concert hall. Theyre on their best behavior, until they spot a fellow culture vulture who also happens to be small, orange and squishy. Honestly, theyre letting all sorts of rabble into these places these days. The Docs decide that a sleeping potion might be a quick and quiet way of capturing Lamput. Naturally things get out of hand, and when the entire audience catches a whiff of the snoozy brew, we find out exactly how hard it is to stay awake during a classical music recital. One star.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a giant home cinema screen.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings find a mask that terrifies anyone who looks at it.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings activate the air conditioners AI, causing it to fall in love with the fridge

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a white bear that fell out of a zoo’s refrigerated truck. After consulting the encyclopedia, he realizes that he and the bear are brothers of the same species! He decides to follow the encyclopedia’s instructions to the letter and take care of his brother during his hibernation. This runs counter to all of the Lemmings favorite activities. The Lemmings decide to create a false encyclopedia page which says that they too are bears. Grizzy is now obliged to treat them like brothers as well.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings’ hard rock concert is driving Grizzy mad. After kicking them out, Grizzy requisitions their ghetto blaster and listens to a relaxation cassette to calm down. The Lemmings discover an ancestral tree whose engraved strips of bark cast targeted maledictions. To recover their material, the Lemmings decide to drive Grizzy out by cursing him with the Ten Plaques of the Savanna.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: Inspired by a magazine, Grizzy decides to redo the cabin’s interior design. To make sure everything is perfect, he ousts the Lemmings and their electric train. By chance, the Lemmings discover an underground futuristic premises in the middle of the savanna. From this secret place, they can see the entire savanna on a giant screen, down to the very inside of Grizzy’s cabin just like in a sandbox video game. By using the menus, they can have an impact on reality and thus... on Grizzy!

programme.title: SuperThings: Rivals of Kaboom - Kazoom Power
programme.desc: Kai and Mia must find a Legendary SuperThing to help them build a Kazoom fragment locator.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: When a rich man writes Scooby into his will, the gang must spend a night in his creepy mansion with kooky relatives and a spooky phantom to collect Scoobys share.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: The gang investigate the mystery of a frightening sorcerer who is haunting a snack factory, while Shaggy and Scooby discover their new favourite food.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The premiere event on the fashion calendar is about to begin!! The Docs chase Lamput in through the stage door and bring the tone way down. Before you know it everyone’s embarked upon a short and exceedingly painful catwalk career. This season’s colour: orange. The Docs try their hand at lighting design. They suck at that, too. The blue nerds get ejected hard by venue security, and Lamput becomes the hit look of the show. So versatile! So changeable! One size fits all!

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean buys an expensive dress for Irma which he plans to return - so has to protect it from damage.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is feeling very left out when he discovers that Mrs Wicket is having a huge party downstairs and apparently he isn’t invited. Bean tries every trick in the book to sneak himself into the party – even resorting to hiding inside an enormous cake. If only he knew the real reason for the celebration.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean digs a hole in his garden - and finds a bomb!

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: After (accidentally) rescuing a kitten from a tree Mr. Bean is set to have his picture in the newspaper!

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings discover that oysters can make pearls and play marbles with it which is driving Grizzy crazy.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: Jealous, Grizzy tries to switch his indifferent fish with the Lemmings affectionate and lively fish

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings use all the cans and tins they can get their hands on to build a beach slide which annoys Grizzy.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings decide to shelter a crab from a seagull but soon, Grizzy sees it as a threat to his peaceful day.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings play pirates on a beached boat. Grizzy, who is fishing further down, realizes that with the Lemmings’ boat, he could come closer to a zone that’s teeming with fish. Grizzy takes a malicious pleasure playing pirate himself to unseat the Lemmings and steal their boat. The Lemmings discover a chest containing real pirate belongings. A telescope conjures the owner’s ghost who immediately places his saber and hook at their disposal.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy sets sail with his fishing gear. But he has no intention of fishing: its a scheme to enjoy a jar of Yummy chocolate spread alone in peace. The Lemmings sense the subterfuge and sink his boat to get the treat, which sinks to the ocean depths. The characters dive in pursuit and discover a school of intelligent crabs that live in an underwater city. Their treasure is a substance that’s even yummier than Yummy.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings find the cabin upside down. Upon closer inspection, it looks like an epic battle took place there. And Grizzy isnt here. The curious Lemmings start imagining what could have happened, visualizing the most improbable scenes for us. They decide to follow their lead to find Grizzy and confirm their zany theories.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: After refusing to practice with her new underwater mode, Batwing is unable to save Batman from Penguins sunken ship trap.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: After agreeing to swap motherboards and change bodies, the Batwheels have to quickly learn to “drive a mile in each other’s wheels” in time to stop the approaching Legion of Zoom!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Bibi has some competition with Nightwing’s motorcycle, Nightbike. These stunt bikes will need to learn that they’re better when they work together.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Ducky and Quizz steal the Bat-Signal’s one-of-a-kind lightbulb, Bam and Batwing must find a way to restore the legendary light.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: After a hot cocoa disaster, Santa Claus hires The Looney Builders to build him a new toyshop in time to save Christmas.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Mayor Foghorn Leghorn hires The Looney Builders to build a giant water slide for Looneyburg’s waterpark.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: It’s Taz’s birthday, so The Looney Builders build him a huge ice cream sundae.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders race against the clock to build Cecil Turtle a new racetrack.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Wanting to cool off from the blistering heat, Tom and Jerry use a little magic to make it snow, turning the witches world into a haunted winter wonderland with an evil snowman, haunted snow forts and magic snowball fights. Now they have to figure out how to make it stop snowing.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: An overflowing trash bin filled with crumpled paper can mean only one thing…Tom is writing a novel - its a mystery novel, of course! Tom soon realizes his book is playing out in real life (including the femme fatale who has taken an interest in the feline Mikey Spillane). At first, Tom has fun crafting his own fate, but soon realizes no matter how hard he tries to rewrite his story, he gets deeper and deeper into trouble. Jerry begins to suspect the alley cat, Butch, is up to no good – in the end, Jerry figures out Butch was retrieving Toms discarded writing from the trash and using it to his advantage!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Ginger brings home a new pet—a mynah bird who can mimic anyone and anything. Rick complains about the money they will have to spend to feed and care for another pet. Spike and Tom are on notice, as somebodys got to go.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Its that special time of year when the Lady of the Houses rare, exotic (and very stinky) cheese gets delivered to the manor. Its up to Tom to make sure not a crumb of this cheese—known to be a favorite of mice—goes missing.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Ginger decides she wants to teach Tom to walk on a leash to ensure he gets much-needed exercise. Tom hates the leash and does not want to go for a walk. Finally, theyre on their way, much to Toms chagrin. Back home, Jerry and Tuffy proceed to raid the fridge.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Ginger leaves some frozen fish on the kitchen counter to thaw. Ginger and Rick warn Tom to keep his paws away, or he will not get anything to eat. Soon, a live baby octopus crawls out of the mouth of one of the thawing fish and jumps off the counter, looking for a place to hide. Jerry befriends him and does his best to protect him from Tom.

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Its Priyas birthday, so the gang is looking for something special as a gift for her. Ella suggests a birthday star, which is a star that is the same light years away as your age.

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Ella stretches the truth a bit when she tells Angelie she can comet surf. She decides to try but finds its a lot harder than it looks. Slippy adds rockets to an asteroid so Ella can practice on that instead.

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Slippy needs iron to fix his spaceracer. Ella tows him to a metal asteroid where Glitch is instructed to cut off a small piece. But when Ella distracts him, he accidentally cuts the asteroid into two large pieces! Ella feels responsible

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Ella is excited to get her own room but Tilly is not as thrilled. She asks Slippy if he can make her a time machine to slow down time so tomorrow never comes. Slippy says the only place time shows down is around black holes.

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Ella has her best idea yet for a fun day. They will visit a nebula for each member of the family! Up first is Bernard 68, but it is very dark and frightens Tilly. When Dads truck breaks down, they head to the Boomerang nebula.

programme.title: Toad And Friends
programme.desc: Hedge finds herself torn in several directions as she tries to help out too many of her friends.

programme.title: Toad And Friends
programme.desc: Portly traps a butterfly in a jar in order to observe it, but when grounded himself, he realizes that no one likes confinement.

programme.title: Toad And Friends
programme.desc: Toad resolves to keep fit in order to win the racing challenge thrown down by the weasels.

programme.title: Toad And Friends
programme.desc: When Toad practises opera singing, he is so dreadful he has to practise high in the sky in his hot air balloon. Could he end up being the first Toad in space?

programme.title: Toad And Friends
programme.desc: Heron struggles to deliver her care package to Badger in deep fog and soon finds herself surrounded by ravenous weasels. Can Toad and his friends rescue her in time?

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean pimps his car in order to prove to Declan - a rival in love - that Beans car is better.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs. Wickets Nephew is staying with her when he wins two tickets to an Outward Boundcourse. She refuses to go, but then ropes in Bean to look after the child. The two start a competition to see who will win the trophy. Bean is a relentless competitor, winning everything up until the point things start getting out of hand ...

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean and Teddy have no plans, so decide to stay in bed all day. Mr Bean is determined that his feet can’t touch the ground, so he pushes the bed around with a broom. He has to find ingenious ways to make his tea and toast for breakfast, brush his teeth and an even bigger challenge of ordering a pizza and collecting it from downstairs without getting out of bed!

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: After seeing the flashy electric go-kart Mr Paliwal has bought for his daughter Divya, Mr Bean and Billy build their own using items around Mrs Wicket’s garden. At the go-kart track, Mr Bean and Mr Paliwal are unimpressed with Billy and Divya’s driving skills so take the karts for a “proper” race around the park. Meanwhile Mrs Wicket is on the warpath when she finds things missing from her house.

programme.title: Lu And The Bally Bunch - Shorts
programme.desc: The bugs talk about how they feel when things change.

programme.desc: Its Priyas birthday, so the gang is looking for something special as a gift for her. Ella suggests a birthday star, which is a star that is the same light years away as your age.

programme.desc: Mike travels to Poland to source a FSM Syrena. But with it being virtually unknown outside of Poland, how will the duo add value to the car and make a profit?

programme.desc: Ree Drummond makes fuss-free food with no cooking required, putting a cowboy spin on her Ranch Muffuletta Sandwich, using a rotisserie chicken in Chinese Chicken Salad and making magical Mermaid Ice Cream.

programme.desc: The team heads to Colorado Springs to search for the remains of Nikola Teslas mysterious laboratory and attempt to prove that Teslas design for generating wireless electricity actually works.

programme.title: Lost Gold Of World War II
programme.desc: In the season finale, the team finally reaches the void space under the waterfall, giving them a glimpse of what lies inside. But excitement is short lived when unexpected visitors get in the way.

programme.title: MonsterQuest
programme.desc: Across the world, people are reporting increasingly frequent encounters with frighteningly large crocodiles.

programme.title: Lost Worlds
programme.desc: An epic journey to the places that heard the word of St Paul and inspired the birth of Christianity.

programme.title: The Universe
programme.desc: In this episode, our experts cook up ten ways you could destroy the earth, including swallowing it with a microscopic black hole, blowing it up with anti-matter, hurling it into the Sun, and switching off gravity.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Could aliens have helped humans build huge ancient structures? Experts ask whether standing stones in Carnac, France, were a GPS system for ancient spacecraft.

programme.title: Life After People
programme.desc: What would happen to Earth if all humans vanished? Outbreak examines the possibility of escaped animals, invasive vines and a deadly virus taking over control from humans.

programme.title: Lost Worlds

programme.title: The Universe
programme.desc: Without the moon, the earth would be a very different and desolate place today: four hours of sunlight with pitch-black nights, steady 100mph winds spawning giant hurricanes lasting for months, and virtually no complex life forms, much less humans.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Experts investigate the similarities in burial tombs from distant cultures, and question whether aliens could have influenced their complicated designs.

programme.title: Search For The Lost Giants
programme.desc: Brothers Jim and Bill Vieira discover a previously unknown hidden chamber where they believe a giant skeleton may be buried.

programme.title: Chasing Mummies
programme.desc: Zahi is determined to disprove the theories of the so-called pyramidiots, who believe that there are secret underground chambers leading to the Sphinx. Little did anyone know that these caves were home to thousands of bats!

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Ricks in the Big Apple to see if he can compute a deal on a rare piece of tech. Can this sweet piece tempt Rick or will he shut it down? A seller flies into the shop with a special edition Stan Lee Funko Pop. Will Corey make a super deal?

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: When a seller strolls in with a collection of action figures signed by the cast of The Walking Dead, will Chum bite? Corey is too cool when a Rock n Roll High School poster comes into the shop. Will the deal be music to his ears?

programme.title: Kevin Costners The West
programme.desc: In northern Wyomings Powder River Valley, a group of ranchers band together to protect their rights to graze cattle; a powerful cabal of cattle barons smear the ranchers as common thieves and plot an invasion.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Dr. J. Allen Hynek was a pioneering scientist. Yet, he is best known as the notorious government UFO debunker who became one of the founding fathers of ufology. Was Dr. Hynek right when he concluded that there is a non-human intelligence on Earth?

programme.title: The Unbelievable With Dan Aykroyd
programme.desc: A blind man who uses bat-like powers of echolocation to navigate his surroundings, a samurai with reflexes faster than a speeding bullet, and a man whos immune to electrocution.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Chum tries to put his best foot forward when a Nike Lebron sneaker hits the counter. Will it be a slam dunk? Then, Rick keeps a close watch on a seller who comes in with a signed Pulp Fiction poster. Can he negotiate a royale-y good price?

programme.title: Curse Of Skinwalker Ranch
programme.desc: A new investigation at the mysterious Triangle reveals multiple UAPs before the team makes an unbelievable discovery in the creek that borders the southern region of the property.

programme.title: The Curse Of Oak Island
programme.desc: While the team races to prepare the Money Pit for the deepest, and final dig of the season, in Malta, the fellowship uncovers a family bloodline that connects the Knights of Malta to Oak Island.
